column2: Formulate an ontology related to cause. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix : <http://example.org/ontology#> .@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .:Cause a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Cause" ;    rdfs:comment "An event or condition that contributes to the production of a result or effect." .:Effect a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Effect" ;    rdfs:comment "An event or condition that is produced by a cause or antecedent." .:causes a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Cause ;    rdfs:range :Effect ;    rdfs:label "causes" ;    rdfs:comment "Relates a cause to its effect." .:isCausedBy a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Effect ;    rdfs:range :Cause ;    rdfs:label "is caused by" ;    rdfs:comment "Relates an effect to its cause." .:hasCause a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain owl:Thing ;    rdfs:range :Cause ;    rdfs:label "has cause" ;    rdfs:comment "Identifies the cause of an entity or event." .:isEffectOf a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Effect ;    rdfs:range :Cause ;    rdfs:label "is effect of" ;    rdfs:comment "Indicates the cause of the specified effect." .:CauseEffectRelation a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Cause-Effect Relation" ;    rdfs:comment "A class representing the relationship between a cause and an effect." .:hasCauseEffectRelation a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain owl:Thing ;    rdfs:range :CauseEffectRelation ;    rdfs:label "has cause-effect relation" ;    rdfs:comment "Links an entity to a cause-effect relation." .# Adding inverse properties:causes owl:inverseOf :isCausedBy .:isCausedBy owl:inverseOf :causes .:hasCause owl:inverseOf :isEffectOf .:isEffectOf owl:inverseOf :hasCause .```

column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: cause. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix : <http://example.org/ontology#> .@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .# Classes:CausalAgent rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Causal Agent" ;    rdfs:comment "An entity that can bring about change or cause an effect." .:Effect rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Effect" ;    rdfs:comment "A result or outcome that is produced by an action or cause." .:Cause rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Cause" ;    rdfs:comment "An entity or event that brings about an effect." .:CausalRelationship rdf:type owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Causal Relationship" ;    rdfs:comment "A relationship between a cause and an effect." .# Object Properties:hasCause rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:label "has Cause" ;    rdfs:domain :CausalRelationship ;    rdfs:range :Cause ;    rdfs:comment "Indicates the cause in a causal relationship." .:hasEffect rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:label "has Effect" ;    rdfs:domain :CausalRelationship ;    rdfs:range :Effect ;    rdfs:comment "Indicates the effect in a causal relationship." .:causes rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:label "causes" ;    rdfs:domain :CausalAgent ;    rdfs:range :Effect ;    rdfs:comment "Relates a causal agent directly to its effect." .:influences rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:label "influences" ;    rdfs:domain :CausalAgent ;    rdfs:range :CausalRelationship ;    rdfs:comment "Indicates that a causal agent has an influence on a causal relationship." .# Example Individuals:EntityA rdf:type :CausalAgent ;    rdfs:label "Entity A" .:EventX rdf:type :Cause ;    rdfs:label "Event X" .:OutcomeY rdf:type :Effect ;    rdfs:label "Outcome Y" .:Relationship1 rdf:type :CausalRelationship ;    :hasCause :EventX ;    :hasEffect :OutcomeY ;    rdfs:label "Relationship 1" .# Additional Annotations:CausalAgent rdfs:subClassOf :Cause .```

column2: Design an ontology to encompass the following: cause.   Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix : <http://example.org/ontology#> .@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .:Cause a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Cause" ;    rdfs:comment "A concept representing the cause of an event or action." .:hasEffect a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Cause ;    rdfs:range :Effect ;    rdfs:label "has effect" ;    rdfs:comment "Relates a cause to its effect." .:Effect a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Effect" ;    rdfs:comment "A concept representing the effect or outcome resulting from a cause." .:isCauseOf a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Event ;    rdfs:range :Event ;    owl:inverseOf :hasCause ;    rdfs:label "is cause of" ;    rdfs:comment "Indicates that one event is the cause of another event." .:hasCause a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Effect ;    rdfs:range :Cause ;    rdfs:label "has cause" ;    rdfs:comment "Indicates that an effect has a cause." .:Event a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Event" ;    rdfs:comment "A concept representing an occurrence or happening." .:TemporalRelation a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:label "temporal relation" ;    rdfs:comment "Captures a temporal relationship between events." .:before a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:subPropertyOf :TemporalRelation ;    rdfs:label "before" ;    rdfs:comment "Indicates one event occurs before another." .:after a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:subPropertyOf :TemporalRelation ;    owl:inverseOf :before ;    rdfs:label "after" ;    rdfs:comment "Indicates one event occurs after another." .```
